Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Significantly \Sig*nif"i*cant*ly\, adv. In a significant manner. [1913 Webster]

significantly adv 1: in a statistically significant way; "the two groups differed significantly" 2: in a significant manner; "our budget will be significantly affected by these new cuts" [ant: {insignificantly}] 3: in an important way or to an important degree; "more importantly, Weber held that the manifold meaning attached to the event by the social scientist could alter his definition of the concrete event itself" [syn: {importantly}]
